item.description:
We have a great line-up for the Aug 13th meetup:

1. Riki Fine from EMC, will present EMC's cloud initiative named 'Atmos' (http://www.emc.com/pr.... With most of the cloud/SaaS companies one hears about being start-ups, It'll be interesting to see how an established industry leading technology provider approaches this exciting domain.

2. Craig Halliwell from TwinStrata (http://www.twinstrata...) will add another perspective about EMC's cloud initiative, one of an ISV. TwinStrata are deployed on Atmos and I know for a fact they're very busy with client engagements...

I've asked both presenters to talk about:
- Requirements they had
- What works well
- What needs to be improved
- Customer traction / experience.

As always, these sessions are interactive so questions will be welcomed. If you would like, feel free to send questions / topics you would like to have one of the presenters talking about.
Regards,
Tsahy.

group.name: Boston Cloud Services - All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS, XaaS

item.name: Boston Cloud Services- All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS,XaaS etc August Meetup
